General.Name: SK Rent A Car Co Ltd
General.Description: SK Rent A Car Co., Ltd provides car rental services in South Korea and internationally. It rents new and used cars, as well as provides car consultation and maintenance services. The company was formerly known as AJ Rent A Car Co., Ltd. SK Rent A Car Co., Ltd was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Seoul, Korea. SK Rent A Car Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of SK Networks Company Limited. AJU Auto Rental Co., Ltd. provides car rental services. AJU Auto Rental Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Avis Korea Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AJU Auto Rental Co., Ltd. in December 2004. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

2.Name: Mr. Kyung-Won  Park
2.Title: Sr. MD, Head of Sales Division & Director
